text: The British Academy Video Games Award for Debut Game is an award presented annually by the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA). It is given in honor of the best first game from any studio or individual. The award was first given at the 8th British Academy Video Games Awards ceremony, held in 2012, with Microsoft Studios-published title Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet winning the award. Since its inception, the award has been given to eight games. As a publisher, Microsoft Studios has received the most nominations in this category with four, followed by Devolver Digital and Sony Interactive Entertainment with three.
